title: Motor Insurance Online Plans (Amit Kamble)
text: By Amit Kamble Jul 26, 2015 Motor insurance plan is also known as Vehicle insurance policy, which provides Insurance coverage for your purchased vehicles like Cars, Motor Cycles, Trucks and other Commercial vehicles roaming on the road. Every vehicle that is roaming on the road should cover under the Motor insurance policy to provide protection to the vehicle as well as to the vehicle owner. Almost all Indian Insurance Companies are offering Motor Insurance Policies with additional benefits. You can select any one of them by comparing their features and benefits which meets your requirements.The primary objective of the Motor Insurance Policy is to provide protection against the loss caused due to physical damage resulting from accidents, traffic collisions and against legal problems. Motor Iinsurance online policy not only covers the loss caused to your vehicle it also provides coverage for Costly accessories like stereos, installed in your vehicle and Third party liability coverage. It provides liability under third party death / disablement and property damage of the third party. It also provides additional discount on anti theft devices installed in your vehicle.You can Buy and Renew your Motor Insurance Policy through online at any time. Almost all the insurance companies are offering online buying facility to make the buying procedure less complicate and you do not need worry about lengthy documentation process involved to buy the policy.You can also calculate your premium using the premium calculatorprovided by the company before buying a policy from the company.For example if your vehicle is in an immobilized state on the road due to an accidental damage, insurance providing company will help you to move your vehicle to the garage and you can also avail additional towing charges from the company. The company surveyor will survey the vehicle and submits his report to the company, then the company will settle the claim after completion of repairing your vehicle. The Insurance companies also providing cashless claim settlement facility at their network garages.Source from : http://www.policydunia.com/motor-insurance-plans/ About the Author I am Amita K working with insurance comapny as insurance adviser owing good knowledge of various policies such as Retirement pension plan, life insurance plan, motor insurance Online , home Insurance so on.
